pages.text: Kitchen Stoves can be used to heat cooking devices.
Kitchen Stoves would stop working after idling for a while.
Stone Stove is cheap and useful. But its speed is half of other stoves, just like $(l:worldgen/fumarole)fumarole vent$(/l).
There're also stoves of $(l:intro/kitchen_materials)other materials$(/l). They are faster but cost more fuel.
